definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
dining hall in a Buddhist temple
Eid al-Fitr or Feast of Breaking the Fast, celebrated on the last day of Ramadan
Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio, Qing dynasty book of tales by 蒲松齡|蒲松龄[Pu2 Song1 ling2]
to stop following a vegetarian diet/to break a fast
food given to Buddhist monks as alms
to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
fast (in several religions)/Ramadan (Islam)/see also 齋月|斋月[Zhai1 yue4]

sentences.chinese: 四旬斋在开始于圣灰星期三。

sentences.english: You love the poem by fasting, praise for the "clear skies icicle."
sentences.chinese: 游受斋爱其诗，赞为“晴空冰柱”。

sentences.english: Lung Chai is a rice farmer in Chiang Mai.
sentences.chinese: 珑斋是清迈的一个稻农。

sentences.english: New Orleans hosts the United States' most notorious Mardi Gras festivities.
sentences.chinese: 新奥尔良主办美国最臭名昭著的四旬斋前狂欢节。

sentences.english: The dates provided here are based on the dates adopted by the Fiqh Council of North America for the celebration of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 这里所提供的入斋日期是根据北美教法协会所提供的。

sentences.english: Lent is the forty-six day period just prior to Easter Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 四旬斋是早期复活节里面为期46天的时期。

sentences.english: The carnival is the final big party before the penitential season of Lent begins.
sentences.chinese: 狂欢节是四旬斋之前的最后狂欢盛会。

sentences.english: The venue of this mega conference will be situated in the heart of Jaipur city.
sentences.chinese: 这次宏大会议的地点选在斋蒲尔市的中心地带。

sentences.english: I know little about Chinese food. Could you tell me what Luo Han…
sentences.chinese: 我对中餐不太了解。请问什么是罗汉斋？

sentences.english: Xian antique market, The Wenbaozhai tourism and shopping center.
sentences.chinese: 西安古玩市场，文宝斋旅游购物中心。

sentences.english: It’s Lent I’ve always had issues with.
sentences.chinese: 我总是对四旬斋有点问题。

sentences.english: The outlook was mainly practiced by "seven-seven vegetarian" popular with the masses.
sentences.chinese: 这种观念世俗化为“七七斋”在民间流行。

sentences.english: A Palestinian boy plays with fireworks to celebrate the holy month of Ramadan, in Gaza City
sentences.chinese: 加沙市，一名巴勒斯坦男孩玩焰火庆祝斋的圣月。

sentences.english: Grotesque masks bob along in a burst of pre-Lenten revelry in Nice, France.
sentences.chinese: 怪异荒诞的面具在法国尼斯四旬斋前狂欢中上下摆动。

sentences.english: Hesitation and uncertainty were written all over his goat-like face.
sentences.chinese: 迟疑不定的神色就很显然地浮上了杜竹斋的山羊脸儿。

sentences.english: The Lenten Rose, or Helleborus orientalis.
sentences.chinese: 四旬斋玫瑰，，或称东方嚏根草。

definition: pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)

lane (usually as part of a street name)/memorial archway
